entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Should platform package pruning data represent GA of a framework or the serviced version? #44566
    9.0.2xx
  • Enable running Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks.UnitTests in CI #25508
  • Add download link for specific SDK version #26255
  • Shared framework ships runtimeconfig.json with unwanted policy settings #32969
  • `dotnet --info` should not cause a worklog log to be emitted #36441
  • The "GenerateStaticWebAsssetsPropsFile" task failed unexpectedly #37456
  • `dotnet publish` fails intermittently on macOS with "error code -10" and no additional information #37472
    Discussion
  • Revert minimum msbuild changes that were checked in to unblock 8.0.1xx codeflow #36216
  • Error dialog when creating a .NET 10.0 WinForms project: You must install or update .NET to run this application #48126
  • Microsoft.DotNet.SDK.8 - "No applicable installer found" when using scope=machine #48066

Updated

  • CanIgnoreTemplateGroupsWithConstraints flaky test failing in CI #46212
  • dotnet watch - Failure in DeleteSubfolder test with polling #46454
  • aspnetcore build failure - Child node 7 exited prematurely #46398
  • [dotnet watch] Cannot open project Lib.fsproj because extension fsproj is not associated with a language #46378
  • Build failure in VMR Vertical Build Windows_x64: Downloading vswhere - Process cannot access sdk.txt because it is being used by another process #45809
  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
    10.0.1xx
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
    10.0.1xx
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
    10.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
    10.0.1xx
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    10.0.1xx
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
    10.0.1xx
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
    10.0.1xx
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
    10.0.1xx
  • Saving disk space by not copying transitive project references in libraries without transitive project references. #48035
  • Add a one-shot execution mode for .NET tools a la npx #31103
  • Make online help more prominent #26981
    Backlog
  • Multiple -s/--source flags on "dotnet build" and "dotnet restore" not working #27202
    Discussion
  • `dotnet list package` does not work when specifying solution #48062
  • Evaluate usefulness and correctness of ValidateBundledManifestSigning target #41081
  • Validate package IDs specified via the #:package directive #47991
  • Allow for automatic workload installation by specifying required workloads in `global.json` #45216
    Backlog
  • `dotnet workload restore` installs "aspire" though it isn't needed or wanted #42486
    Backlog
  • Multi-arch/framework in restore/build/publish commands #36727
    Backlog
  • Test failed in CI: Microsoft.NET.Build.Tests.GlobalPropertyFlowTests.TestGlobalPropertyFlowInSolution #29478
    Backlog
  • Reduce the use of .Result/.Wait()/.GetResult() in the codebase #23850
    Backlog
  • "dotnet build-server shutdown" equivalent for SharedCompilationId and -pipename? #20183
    Backlog
  • `dotnet publish --tl on` fails with `MSBUILD : error MSB1009: Project file does not exist.` #36921
    Backlog
  • dotnet-watch support for publish subprocess #38340
  • After Upgrade vom 8.0.0 to 8.0.1 => Automaticly restarted service is not working #38335
  • Create an MSBuild Task that package authors can use to verify that a .NET Tool is able to be invoked #38883
  • Project reference version defaults to 1.0.0.0 in `*.deps.json` file #42490
  • CopyDebugSymbolFilesFromPackages does not copy pdbs from runtime dir #38322
  • `dotnet sln migrate` should take over `.slnLaunch` as `.slnxLaunch` #48014
  • Show build error summary in latest console output when running dotnet run or dotnet watch and suppress warnings #48143
    Discussion
  • Add support for tool@version to tool install commands #48155
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.2xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #48124
  • Building PublishProfile=DefaultContainer doesn't show output indicating a container image gets built. [.NET 9] #44837
  • Install .NET 9 from Ubuntu official jammy\noble source? #44835
  • Linux installers should install manpages to correct location #44833
  • Failure of Deterministic Build #44323
  • MapStaticAssets causing exception in SDK during publish #44858
  • .NET 9 terminal logger litters output with "Build succeeded" on commands that do not build anything #44848
  • One-shot execution mode for build servers #44846
  • list package --vulnerable fails with: "error: '' is not a valid version string" #44840
  • Track the usage of the built-in SBOM generation via telemetry #47918
  • Should Throw Error When Adding Projects with the Same Name but Different Paths to Solution Folder #47859
  • Correctly configuring .NET SDK(s) in a Linux environment #45029
  • How to install the latest .NET 8 and 9 on ubuntu 22.04? #44869
  • dotnet nuget why doesn't spot existence of dependency #47982
  • Add `--format json` option to `dotnet new install` #47958
  • Align #:package syntax with CLI for specifying package ID and version #47990
  • (Immutable) collection properties break value based equality in records #48027
  • dotnet pack on maccatalyst with Release config misconfigures search path for files #48041
  • Hot reload Model issue with WebAPI project #48145
  • Force dotnet reference add without checking for validity #48148
    Backlog
  • Misleading Compile Error Message - "You must either set PublishSingleFile to false or set UseAppHost to true." #48152
  • -warnnotaserror does not work for warning NU1605 #37972
  • Revise `TryGetProjectOrSolutionFilePath` and `GetSolutionFilePaths` logic for the new dotnet test experience #47635
    10.0.1xx
  • Support launch profile configuration file named [ApplicationName].run.json in the app root #48200
  • Use Configuration.StartsWith('Debug') instead of Configuration == 'Debug' for Debug specific build settings #44920

PullRequests

Created

  • dotnet CLI: Rename source files for consistency #48234
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Exclude dotnet*.js files from signing-validation #48233
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.4.25203.1 #48226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove `testfx` from VMR source mappings #48225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #48203
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • dotnet CLI: Consolidate ResX files #48199
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Ignore .dwarf files in signing validation #48229
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish scenario-tests logs for installer tests #48227
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48150
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Keep artifact directory #48218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #48223
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Additional endpoints were incorrectly being passed to consuming projects #48224
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.3xx] Open Test1.cs in Visual Studio, not MSTestSettings.cs #48167
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect index in MSTest template #48168
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Use Roslyn to parse directives in file-based programs #47978
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • tool install/update: Support package@version syntax #48085
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use global temp directory for run file outputs #48169
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Add workloads build #47225
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Nonfunctional code #48076
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update all test sdk references to the latest version. #45548
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to spliting our test work items by method instead of class. #44898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Split tests by method rather than class #45520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #48149
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #48151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48154
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48185
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
